name: BODY BUILDING
description: bodybuilding, a regimen of exercises designed to enhance the human body's muscular development and promote general health and fitness.

name: MUSCLE GAIN
description: Studies from the CDC have found that muscle-building exercise can also improve balance, reduce the likelihood of falls, improve blood-sugar control, and improve sleep and mental health.

name: WEIGHT LOSS
description: Weight loss can reduce your blood pressure and cholesterol. It can also slash risk for diabetes, heart disease, stroke, gallbladder disease, and osteoarthritis.
